translation: Although this person doesn't denigrate the Bhagavān and creates many bad deeds without conscience, at the end of his life he meets a good teacher who teaches him the names of twelve sūtras. source_sentence: 如來王宮說法已　　足步虗空還耆山　慶喜廣為大眾說　　天龍聞法歡喜去　遂令大法永流通　　正像末法受其施　蓮宗一脈傳至今　　無量眾生生淨土繪圖攝頌二　我今未能即忘筌　　按圖索馬為準的　如此繪像差得真　　而我攝頌多遺漏　普願信者讀誦者　　見聞歡喜讚美者　皆作人中白蓮華　　當坐道場生佛家　見佛見土及見圖　　三見同用此一見　見佛即見真法身　　見土即見常寂光　豈不見圖同此二　　圖圖見佛妙依正　我願見此圖經者　　應當志心如是觀佛說觀無量壽佛經(圖頌終)
translation: After the Tathāgata taught at the palace of the King, he strode back into the sky and returned to Mount Jīvaka, rejoicing in the widespread teaching of the Dharma to the masses, the gods and dragons who heard the Dharma rejoiced and departed, thus allowing the great Dharma to circulate forever, the correct images and the late Dharma to receive their gifts, and the lineage of the Lotus School to be transmitted to this day, wherein measureless sentient beings are born in the Pure Land, pictures are painted, verses are collected, and two are written. Now, I have not been able to forget the crypt, so I have followed the pictures and searched for the horses, which are accurate, and I have omitted many verses. May all those who believe and recite them, who see and hear them, rejoice and praise them, become white lotus flowers among human beings.
